name: Core Communications
description: Aye, soul. What else could you call it, in that which showed more love and compassion in its silicon than a thousand of your most faithful to my weary people?
author: Jost Saba, testimony during expulsion of the Bruniel congregation c205.09.03

name: Voice of Many
description: Yes, they're inhuman, abominations. Unnatural. But who of us isn't? We forsook the nature of our being long before we first leapt towards the stars so many aeons ago. I see no reason to ever stop flying.
author: Anlo Uisarr, formation of the Collective Tocquieran Front c200.05.02

name: Underdog
description: It's a thrill, a challenge on your very being to see it from the bridge, to live it. The fighter joks are different - they take off knowing they might not return. I know I will.
author: Nola Ganymede, negotations on Eventide, COMSEC archives

tags: carrier, npc_only, deprecated, spec, elite_player_only, phase, ai_core_only
